00012     public static function read($file, $section = null, $options = array()) {
00013         $Zend_Config = new Zend_Config_Ini($file, $section, $options);
00014         $MOC_Config = new MOC_Configuration($Zend_Config->toArray());

00019     public static function write(MOC_Configuration $Configuration, $filename) {
00020         $Zend_Config = new Zend_Config($Configuration->getAll());
00021         $Zend_Writer = new Zend_Config_Writer_Ini(array('config' => $Zend_Config, 'filename' => $filename));
